hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: DATABASE_WIPE
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: If set to 1 it will wipe the database

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash ssh api.jibely.com /root/wakemakin-ci/puppet/sync_config.sh if [ $DATABASE_WIPE -eq 1 ]; then ssh api.jibely.com supervisorctl stop faro_api ssh api.jibely.com mysql -u root --password=password -e 'drop database faro_api; create database faro_api;" ssh api.jibely.com supervisorctl start faro_api fi response=$(curl --write-out %{http_code} --silent --output /dev/null 'http://api.jibely.com/users') if [ $response -ne 200 ]; then echo "Server failed to respond" exit 1 fi
